description:
Designed with simplicity in mind, Vovsoft CSV to JSON Converter can only perform one task, that of extracting the contents from the input CSV container, then transfer it to a newly created JSON file.

Designed with simplicity in mind, Vovsoft CSV to JSON Converter can only perform one task, that of extracting the contents from the input CSV container, then transfer it to a newly created JSON file. In other words, you just have to select the input CSV file and choose to export it to JSON format, all with just a few clicks.

The best part of the program is that the conversion is done completely offline. You can convert small files as well as large files bigger than 1 gigabyte. You are the only controller of your private data. No CSV or JSON file is sent to the internet in any case.
